chapter.title: Putting all together
chapter.para: So far we have seen the most important objects involved doing an audio processing tree. Now we want to do complete example putting all together. In this example we instantiate AgsAudioThread and AgsChannelThread to play a simple pattern. The sound we use is generated using a sinus wave.
In order that the threads are used we provide an appropriate AgsConfig. Further we define an AgsPattern and add the needed recalls to do playback using the AgsRecallFactory.
